record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, on the Democratic side, we have six 10-minute speeches. I ask unanimous consent that each Democratic Senator have their full time and, of course, the Republicans would have their full 60 minutes when we complete ours.
Now I ask unanimous consent that Senator Salazar be recognized, followed by Senator Gregg, if he is here, Senator Conrad, Senator Bennett, Senator Durbin, and me, in that order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
